name: Wedding Planning Services
short_description: Comprehensive wedding planning to make your dream day stress-free.
long_description: Our Wedding Planning Services are your key to a truly stress-free wedding experience. We believe in turning your dreams into reality by meticulously planning every detail. From choosing the perfect venue to handpicking vendors who align with your vision, we're here to make your journey to 'I do' an absolute breeze. Let us handle the logistics while you savor the joy of this momentous occasion.
service_details: Comprehensive wedding planning services to ensure a stress-free experience. Services included: Venue selection and booking, Vendor coordination (catering, photography, music, etc.), Timeline creation and management, Wedding rehearsal coordination, Guest list management, Budget planning and management. Additional options available.

name: Custom Floral Arrangements
short_description: Bespoke floral designs tailored to your style and preferences.
long_description: Our Custom Floral Arrangements are more than just flowers; they're an expression of your love story. Our skilled florists are passionate about translating your unique style and preferences into stunning bouquets, centerpieces, and floral installations. We believe that every petal should whisper the beauty of your union, and our commitment to sourcing the freshest blooms ensures your wedding is an unforgettable botanical masterpiece.
service_details: Bespoke floral arrangements tailored to your style and preferences. Services included: Bridal bouquet, Bridesmaids' bouquets, Groom's boutonniere, Corsages and boutonnieres for family, Ceremony arch and aisle arrangements, Reception table centerpieces. Customization available. Delivery and setup included.

name: Photography and Videography
short_description: Capture your special moments with professional photography and videography.
long_description: Our Photography and Videography services are more than just snapshots; they're a narrative of your love story. We're dedicated to preserving the magic of your wedding day by artfully capturing every heartfelt moment. From the tear in your eye as you exchange vows to the infectious joy on the dance floor, our team uses high-quality equipment and artistic vision to ensure your wedding memories are a cherished masterpiece.
service_details: Professional photography and videography services to capture every moment. Services included: Full-day coverage, High-resolution edited photos, Engagement photoshoot, Online gallery for easy sharing, Print release for personal use. Videography options available. Editing and delivery included.

name: Catering and Gourmet Dining
short_description: Indulge your guests with exquisite gourmet cuisine.
long_description: Our Catering and Gourmet Dining services are a symphony of flavors designed to delight your guests' palates. We craft delectable menus that cater to diverse tastes and dietary preferences, ensuring that every bite is a culinary journey. Whether you prefer an elegant plated dinner or a lavish buffet, our chefs are committed to creating a memorable dining experience for you and your loved ones.
service_details: Exquisite gourmet cuisine to indulge your guests. Menu options: Customized menu planning, Appetizers and hors d'oeuvres, Multiple-course meals, Dessert stations, Late-night snacks, Dietary accommodations. Service options: Professional waitstaff, Buffet or plated service, Beverage packages, Bar services, Tableware and linens. Tasting session available.

name: Live Entertainment and Music
short_description: Keep the party alive with live music and entertainment.
long_description: Our Live Entertainment and Music services are the heartbeats of your wedding celebration. We understand the power of music to set the perfect atmosphere, from the romantic melodies during the ceremony to the lively tunes that keep the dance floor buzzing all night long. Our talented musicians and performers ensure your guests will be talking about the entertainment for years to come.
service_details: Live music and entertainment to keep the party alive. Music options: Live bands, String quartets, DJ services, Solo musicians, Customized playlists. Performance options: Ceremony music, Cocktail hour entertainment, Reception party music, Special song requests, Interactive performances. Consultation available.

name: Wedding Stationery and Invitations
short_description: Create a lasting impression with custom-designed wedding stationery.
long_description: Our Wedding Stationery and Invitations are the first glimpses of your special day that your guests will receive. We understand the importance of making a lasting impression, and that's why our talented designers meticulously craft elegant and personalized invitations, save-the-dates, and more. We pay attention to every detail to ensure your wedding stationery leaves a lasting impression on your guests and perfectly complements your unique wedding theme.
service_details: Create a lasting impression with custom-designed wedding stationery. Stationery items: Custom invitations, Save-the-date cards, Wedding programs, Menu cards, Place cards, Thank-you cards. Design options: Variety of paper and printing options, Customized fonts and colors, Embossing and foiling, Unique envelope designs, RSVP and guest information cards. Consultation available.
